output:
I can only lose all the love I use
I'm living in a funny state of blues
I wish I could hide inside a little bit of sun
That would bring me just a little bit of fun
Cause I can hear a chime in the middle of these chords
Something that could easily be preached by the lords
And so now I know and I'm sure I can afford
Being sentimental and be proud to sing out loud
About how I feel
Oh, oh, oh, oh
If the way you look at your life's confused
It might be that your joy's not yet consumed
Bring it outside and you'll see
How easy it can be
To change your blues into the colors you need
Cause I can hear it chime in the middle of this court
Something that could easily be preached by the lords
And somehow I know and I'm sure I can afford
Being sentimental and too proud to sing out loud
About how I feel
Oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh
